name: Ball Builders
description:
Ball Builders is a simple puzzle game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. The goal of the game is to try and reach the blue platform by building something out of balls that can connect together while avoiding any obstacles that get in the way.

Link to browser version: https://kaynor.itch.io/ball-builders-browser-version

Controls

  • WASD keys to move the camera
  • Mouse wheel to zoom in/out
  • Right click ball spawner to spawn a ball
  • Left click ball to move ball

Tips

  • Red balls connect to blue balls
  • Placing balls too close together will launch a blue ball instead!
  • Good luck trying to beat all of the levels!
